title: Advanced Web Development
description: Dive into advanced web development concepts, focusing on JavaScript frameworks, server-side development, and databases.

lessons.title: Introduction to React
lessons.description: Learn the basics of React, a popular JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.

content.data: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, maintained by Facebook.
https://example.com/react-introduction-video

lessons.title: Understanding Vue
lessons.description: Explore Vue.js and how it differs from other JavaScript frameworks.

content.data: Vue.js is an open-source JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.
https://example.com/vue-overview-video

lessons.title: Node.js Basics
lessons.description: Learn the fundamentals of Node.js and its role in server-side JavaScript.

content.data: Node.js allows JavaScript to run on the server, offering a fast and scalable solution.
https://example.com/node-intro-audio

lessons.title: Express.js for Web Servers
lessons.description: Get started with Express.js, a Node.js framework for building web servers.

content.data: Express.js is a flexible Node.js web application framework that provides tools for building robust servers.
https://example.com/express-basics-video

lessons.title: Introduction to SQL
lessons.description: Learn SQL, the standard language for managing relational databases.

content.data: SQL (Structured Query Language) is used to manage data in relational databases like MySQL and PostgreSQL.
https://example.com/sql-intro-video

lessons.title: NoSQL Databases
lessons.description: Explore NoSQL databases like MongoDB, designed for unstructured data.

content.data: NoSQL databases provide flexible schemas and are suited for large-scale data applications.
https://example.com/nosql-databases-video

title: Mobile App Development
description: Learn the essentials of building mobile applications, including both iOS and Android platforms, with a focus on native and cross-platform development.

lessons.title: Mobile Development Basics
lessons.description: An overview of mobile platforms, development tools, and app design considerations.

content.data: Mobile app development involves creating software applications that run on mobile devices.
https://example.com/mobile-basics-video

lessons.title: Designing for Mobile
lessons.description: Explore the principles of UI/UX design for mobile applications.

content.data: Mobile design requires a focus on usability and small screen real estate.
https://example.com/mobile-design-video

lessons.title: Getting Started with React Native
lessons.description: Learn how to build cross-platform mobile applications with React Native.

content.data: React Native enables developers to use a single codebase for both iOS and Android.
https://example.com/react-native-intro-video

lessons.title: Flutter Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to Flutter, Googleâ€™s toolkit for building natively compiled applications.

content.data: Flutter allows for fast development with a rich set of pre-designed widgets.
https://example.com/flutter-basics-video

title: Cybersecurity Basics
description: An introductory course on cybersecurity principles, covering threat types, secure coding practices, and network security.

lessons.title: Understanding Cyber Threats
lessons.description: Learn about different types of cyber threats and how they impact systems.

content.data: Cyber threats are techniques that attackers use to gain unauthorized access to systems.
https://example.com/cyber-threats-video

lessons.title: Introduction to Encryption
lessons.description: Explore the basics of encryption and its role in securing data.

content.data: Encryption is the process of encoding information to prevent unauthorized access.
https://example.com/encryption-intro-video

lessons.title: Secure Coding Practices
lessons.description: Best practices for writing secure code and preventing vulnerabilities.

content.data: Secure coding practices aim to prevent common vulnerabilities in software applications.
https://example.com/secure-coding-video

lessons.title: Network Security Basics
lessons.description: Understand network security principles and how to protect networks from unauthorized access.

content.data: Network security involves measures to protect data during transmission across networks.
https://example.com/network-security-video
